name: Cats Hidden in Paris
description:
Cats Hidden in Paris is a very easy and cute hidden object game set in Paris, France.

100 cats are waiting for you to be discovered within a hand-drawn background.
Relax thanks to the chill soundtrack

Found a cat? Click on it!

Features

🐾 1 Level, 100 cats

❔ Easter Eggs
💡 Hint System
⏰ Timer mode with leaderboard
⚙️ In-game Settings



https://store.steampowered.com/app/2377970/Cats_Hidden_Around_the_World/
